items.sentence: Tom says that he hasn't heard anything from Mary.
He really enjoys and appreciates classical music.
I think that you'll be able to change Tom's mind.
I forwarded the schedule that you sent me to Tom.
I forgot that Tom knew how to play the accordion.
I didn't think that Tom knew how to play mahjong.
I got the impression that Tom wanted to be alone.
I think that we've learned a little bit from Tom.
I dried myself with the towel that Tom handed me.
Is there anything that you can tell me about Tom?
I hope that you're not planning to do that today.
It's very dangerous to walk around here at night.
I don't think we could survive on just my salary.
Tom had to leave his dog outside the supermarket.
How difficult is it to renounce your citizenship?
If I hadn't had this map, I would've gotten lost.
The sun had already set by the time Tom got home.
When I woke up this morning, it was raining hard.
Mary was happy to be reunited with her boyfriend.
I think you'd better change your profile picture.
